name: Add user profile settings page
description:
We need to add a user profile settings page to the application.

Users should be able to update their profile information, change their password, and manage notification preferences.

## Acceptance Criteria
- User can access profile settings page from main navigation
- User can update their name, email, and profile picture
- User can change their password
- User can configure notification preferences
- Changes are saved when user clicks Save button
